juzs.text: yawma yunfakhu fi l-suri fatatuna afwajan
la yadhuquna fiha bardan wala sharaban
la yasmaʿuna fiha laghwan wala kidhaban
rabbi l-samawati wal-ardi wama baynahuma l-rahmani la yamlikuna min'hu khitaban
yawma yaqumu l-ruhu wal-malaikatu saffan la yatakallamuna illa man adhina lahu l-rahmanu waqala sawaban
dhalika l-yawmu l-haqu faman shaa ittakhadha ila rabbihi maaban
inna andharnakum ʿadhaban qariban yawma yanzuru l-maru ma qaddamat yadahu wayaqulu l-kafiru yalaytani kuntu turaban
idh nadahu rabbuhu bil-wadi l-muqadasi tuwan
faqul hal laka ila an tazakka
inna fi dhalika laʿib'ratan liman yakhsha
a-antum ashaddu khalqan ami l-samau banaha
wa-amma man khafa maqama rabbihi wanaha l-nafsa ʿani l-hawa
ka-annahum yawma yarawnaha lam yalbathu illa ʿashiyyatan aw duhaha
likulli im'ri-in min'hum yawma-idhin shanun yugh'nihi
dhi quwwatin ʿinda dhi l-ʿarshi makinin
wama tashauna illa an yashaa l-lahu rabbu l-ʿalamina
yaayyuha l-insanu ma gharraka birabbika l-karimi
fi ayyi suratin ma shaa rakkabaka
thumma ma adraka ma yawmu l-dini
yawma la tamliku nafsun linafsin shayan wal-amru yawma-idhin lillahi
alladhina idha ik'talu ʿala l-nasi yastawfuna
kalla inna kitaba l-fujari lafi sijjinin
wama yukadhibu bihi illa kullu muʿ'tadin athimin
idha tut'la ʿalayhi ayatuna qala asatiru l-awalina
kalla bal rana ʿala qulubihim ma kanu yaksibuna
kalla innahum ʿan rabbihim yawma-idhin lamahjubuna
thumma yuqalu hadha alladhi kuntum bihi tukadhibuna
kalla inna kitaba l-abrari lafi ʿilliyyina
khitamuhu mis'kun wafi dhalika falyatanafasi l-mutanafisuna
inna alladhina ajramu kanu mina alladhina amanu yadhakuna
wa-idha inqalabu ila ahlihimu inqalabu fakihina
wa-idha ra-awhum qalu inna haulai ladalluna
fal-yawma alladhina amanu mina l-kufari yadhakuna
hal thuwwiba l-kufaru ma kanu yafʿaluna
yaayyuha l-insanu innaka kadihun ila rabbika kadhan famulaqihi
wa-amma man utiya kitabahu waraa zahrihi
bala inna rabbahu kana bihi basiran
wa-idha quri-a ʿalayhimu l-qur'anu la yasjuduna
illa alladhina amanu waʿamilu l-salihati lahum ajrun ghayru mamnunin
wahum ʿala ma yafʿaluna bil-mu'minina shuhudun
wama naqamu min'hum illa an yu'minu bil-lahi l-ʿazizi l-hamidi
alladhi lahu mul'ku l-samawati wal-ardi wal-lahu ʿala kulli shayin shahidun
inna alladhina fatanu l-mu'minina wal-mu'minati thumma lam yatubu falahum ʿadhabu jahannama walahum ʿadhabu l-hariqi
inna alladhina amanu waʿamilu l-salihati lahum jannatun tajri min tahtiha l-anharu dhalika l-fawzu l-kabiru
in kullu nafsin lamma ʿalayha hafizun
fama lahu min quwwatin wala nasirin
illa ma shaa l-lahu innahu yaʿlamu l-jahra wama yakhfa
thumma la yamutu fiha wala yahya
laysa lahum taʿamun illa min dariʿin
la yus'minu wala yugh'ni min juʿin
afala yanzuruna ila l-ibili kayfa khuliqat
hal fi dhalika qasamun lidhi hij'rin
alam tara kayfa faʿala rabbuka biʿadin
allati lam yukh'laq mith'luha fi l-biladi
fa-amma l-insanu idha ma ib'talahu rabbuhu fa-akramahu wanaʿʿamahu fayaqulu rabbi akramani
wa-amma idha ma ib'talahu faqadara ʿalayhi riz'qahu fayaqulu rabbi ahanani
kalla idha dukkati l-ardu dakkan dakkan
wajia yawma-idhin bijahannama yawma-idhin yatadhakkaru l-insanu wa-anna lahu l-dhik'ra
ayahsabu an lan yaqdira ʿalayhi ahadun
aw it'ʿamun fi yawmin dhi masghabatin
thumma kana mina alladhina amanu watawasaw bil-sabri watawasaw bil-marhamati
wa-alladhina kafaru biayatina hum ashabu l-mashamati
faqala lahum rasulu l-lahi naqata l-lahi wasuq'yaha
fakadhabuhu faʿaqaruha fadamdama ʿalayhim rabbuhum bidhanbihim fasawwaha
wama yugh'ni ʿanhu maluhu idha taradda
wama li-ahadin ʿindahu min niʿ'matin tuj'za
laqad khalaqna l-insana fi ahsani taqwimin
illa alladhina amanu waʿamilu l-salihati falahum ajrun ghayru mamnunin
kalla la-in lam yantahi lanasfaʿan bil-nasiyati
laylatu l-qadri khayrun min alfi shahrin
tanazzalu l-malaikatu wal-ruhu fiha bi-idh'ni rabbihim min kulli amrin
lam yakuni alladhina kafaru min ahli l-kitabi wal-mush'rikina munfakkina hatta tatiyahumu l-bayinatu
rasulun mina l-lahi yatlu suhufan mutahharatan
wama tafarraqa alladhina utu l-kitaba illa min baʿdi ma jaathumu l-bayinatu
wama umiru illa liyaʿbudu l-laha mukh'lisina lahu l-dina hunafaa wayuqimu l-salata wayu'tu l-zakata wadhalika dinu l-qayimati
inna alladhina kafaru min ahli l-kitabi wal-mush'rikina fi nari jahannama khalidina fiha ulaika hum sharru l-bariyati
inna alladhina amanu waʿamilu l-salihati ulaika hum khayru l-bariyati
jazauhum ʿinda rabbihim jannatu ʿadnin tajri min tahtiha l-anharu khalidina fiha abadan radiya l-lahu ʿanhum waradu ʿanhu dhalika liman khashiya rabbahu
yawma-idhin yasduru l-nasu ashtatan liyuraw aʿmalahum
faman yaʿmal mith'qala dharratin khayran yarahu
waman yaʿmal mith'qala dharratin sharran yarahu
afala yaʿlamu idha buʿ'thira ma fi l-quburi
illa alladhina amanu waʿamilu l-salihati watawasaw bil-haqi watawasaw bil-sabri
alam tara kayfa faʿala rabbuka bi-ashabi l-fili
alladhi atʿamahum min juʿin waamanahum min khawfin
wara-ayta l-nasa yadkhuluna fi dini l-lahi afwajan
fasabbih bihamdi rabbika wa-is'taghfir'hu innahu kana tawwaban
ma aghna ʿanhu maluhu wama kasaba
